The innermost of the Galilean moons, Io, is perhaps the most volcanically active body in our solar system.
Jupiter’s Moons Jupiter’s satellite system, consisting of 67 moons discovered thus far, resembles a miniature solar system.
Galileo discovered the 4 largest satellites, referred to as Galilean satellites, in 1610 .
